About.name:
Alejandro
Perez-canto
About.heroDescription: I craft digital experiences that combine beautiful design with clean, efficient code. With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in creating responsive web applications that solve real business problems.
About.bio1: I'm a passionate developer and designer with a deep interest in creating intuitive, user-centered digital experiences. My journey in tech began over 5 years ago, and I've since worked with startups, agencies, and established companies to build products that users love.
About.bio2: With a background in Systems Engineering and a keen eye for design, I aim to bridge the gap between functionality and aesthetics. I believe that the best digital products are those that solve real problems, while providing a seamless, enjoyable user experience.
About.quote: "I don't just build websites and applications; I create digital experiences that connect businesses with their audiences in meaningful ways."
About.bio3: When I'm not coding or designing, you'll find me exploring new hiking trails, experimenting with photography. I believe that drawing inspiration from diverse sources is key to creative problem-solving in tech.

rdg.title: RDG Website Revamp
rdg.subtitle: Complete Branding & Website Overhaul
rdg.description: Revamped RDG’s brand identity and completely restructured their website, featuring state-of-the-art animations and dynamic effects.
rdg.longDescription:
This project involved a full rebranding and a complete redesign of RDG's digital presence. I created a brand-new website from scratch, integrating cutting-edge animations that bring the site to life and enhance user interaction.

The standout feature was the innovative use of animations, providing a modern, engaging aesthetic while improving overall user experience.
rdg.challenges: Integrating seamless animations while maintaining optimal performance required meticulous optimisation and innovative design strategies.

medeiros.title: Medeiros Wines Website Rebuild
medeiros.subtitle: From Static HTML to a Dynamic Next.js Experience
medeiros.description: Recreated the Medeiros Wines website with UI and accessibility enhancements, transitioning from plain HTML to Next.js.
medeiros.longDescription: The site was rebuilt from scratch, faithfully replicating the original design while introducing improvements in UI and accessibility. The transformation into a modern Next.js app ensured better performance and user experience.
medeiros.challenges: Accurately replicating an existing website while enhancing UI and accessibility required meticulous attention to detail.

proamerican.title: Pro American Trailers Enhancement
proamerican.subtitle: Multi-Language & SEO-Optimised Redesign
proamerican.description: Added multi-language support and SEO-focused pages, improving performance with Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
proamerican.longDescription: Maintaining the original design, I introduced multi-language support and SEO pages. Targeted optimisations ensured a fast, responsive and globally accessible site.
proamerican.challenges: Integrating multi-language support and SEO optimisation while ensuring performance demanded careful planning.
